Description_lang: Malfurion will choose to cleanse the ground under the Force of Nightmare with the largest number of players near it.  Forces of Nightmare that are cleansed transform into Allies of Nature. Additionally, players within 12 yards of the target have all stacks of Creeping Nightmares cleansed.
AuraDescription_lang: Cleansing the ground under one of the Allies of Nightmare.
